result.reviewer: Kanyerere, G.Z., Phiri, T.B. & Snoeks, J.
result.errata_reason: This errata version of the assessment was created to correct a Reviewer name from "Kanyerere, Z." to "Kanyerere, G.Z.", another Reviewer name from "Phiri, B." to "Phiri, T.B." and a Contributor name from "Kasembe, J." to "Kazembe, J.". Additionally, a point data map was added as this was accidentally missed out of the previous assessment.
